name: Stretch Concealer
description: A concealer with elastic micro waxes that move with your face, giving a dewy, glowing finish.

name: Wowder
description: A setting powder that cuts shine, blurs pores, and looks like natural skin.

name: Haloscope
description: A highlighter with crystal extracts for a hydrated, dewy glow.

name: Perfecting Skin Tint
description: A lightweight skin tint that evens out discoloration and leaves your skin looking dewy.

name: Fly With Me Mascara
description: A mascara that adds volume and length for a dramatic eye look.
